markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 15"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Legendary Codebreaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=801) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Legendary in [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

</column>

---

Your skill with languages and codes is so great that you can decipher information with little more than a quick read through a text. You can Decipher Writing using Society while reading at normal speed. If you slow down and spend the full amount of time that’s ordinarily required and roll a success, you get a critical success; if you critically succeed while spending the normal amount of time, you gain a nearly word-for-word understanding of the document.
name: Legendary Codebreaker

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<summary>
Quickly Decipher Writing using Society.
</summary>
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 15" pfs="Standard" > Legendary Codebreaker Source Core Rulebook pg. 262 4.0 Prerequisites Legendary in Society --- Your skill with languages and codes is so great that you can decipher information with little more than a quick read through a text. You can Decipher Writing using Society while reading at normal speed. If you slow down and spend the full amount of time that’s ordinarily required and roll a success, you get a critical success; if you critically succeed while spending the normal amount of time, you gain a nearly word-for-word understanding of the document.
